India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: Former Union minister Suresh Kalmadi passes away at 81; funeral today in Pune
Article Text:
Former Union minister and ex-IOA chief Suresh Kalmadi passes away in Pune

Pune Headlines Today — Key Stories You Shouldn’t Miss.







PUNE: Former Union minister and senior Congress leader Suresh Kalmadi passed away at the age of 81 after a prolonged illness.He was undergoing treatment at Deenanath Mangeshkar Hospital in Pune.According to his office, Kalmadi’s mortal remains will be kept at Kalmadi House in Erandwane till 2 pm to allow people to pay their last respects. The cremation will be held at Vaikunth smashanbhumi in Navi Peth, Pune, at 3.30 pm.Kalmadi was a veteran politician and sports administrator who served as the president of the Indian Olympic Association (IOA) and played a key role in India’s sports administration for several years.He came under national scrutiny in connection with the 2010 Commonwealth Games corruption case and was booked under the Prevention of Corruption Act for alleged misappropriation of Games funds. He was arrested in April 2011, following which the Congress suspended him from the party.Despite the controversy, Kalmadi continued to wield influence in sports bodies. In 2016, he and Abhay Singh Chautala were appointed life presidents of the IOA by a panel of over 150 members.However, after the Union sports minister sought a probe into the decision, Kalmadi declined the honour, stating in a letter to then IOA president N Ramachandran that the timing was not appropriate for him to accept the post.Before entering politics, Kalmadi served in the Indian Air Force as a pilot from 1964 to 1972, and retired from service in 1974. He later entered public life and went on to serve as Minister of State for Railways between 1995 and 1996 during a Congress-led government.
Article Summary: Former union minister and ex-ioa chief suresh kalmadi passes away in pune. The cremation will be held at vaikunth smashanbhumi in navi peth, pune, at 3.30 pm. He came under national scrutiny in connection with the 2010 commonwealth games corruption case.

Article Title: “She feels exposed”: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken and uncomfortable by Travis Kelce’s controversial confession ahead of their wedding
Article Text:
Taylor Swift is reportedly terriefied because of Travis Kelce.(Image via Backgrid)

Taylor Swift is reportedly scared of Travis Kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding

Taylor Swift’s boyfriend, Travis Kelce, is speculated to be retiring this season





Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have had a pretty hard time this season as the Kansas City Chiefs have recorded a pretty average performance on the field this time.With the season coming to an end now, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce seem to be focused on their wedding. But there is something that is reportedly bothering the billionaire pop star.A few weeks ago, Travis Kelce had confessed on his popular podcast, New Heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.It seems Taylor Swift is really bothered by this confession. As per Radar Online, a source has revealed that, "Taylor hates that this has become a talking point again. She's spent years crafting a clean, family-friendly image, and she's terrified that something from Travis's past could smear that."A second source added, "She's incredibly proud of how hard he's worked to turn his life around – but this story coming back up makes her feel exposed.”The source continued, “Taylor's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative."However, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce has responded to these speculations as they continue to be tight lipped about their wedding.Travis Kelce has confessed that he had to go to a therapist after the marijuana incident in college.The popular tight end said, "I had to sit down with a shrink for an hour a week…”Travis Kelce added, "He got me to look at my life way more strategically. He got me to understand that you go through these emotions, and your reaction can either help you or hurt you or be indifferent."Despite the obstacles that Travis Kelce faced in his life, he has proven his worth on the field and is easily one of the highest paid players in the league.However, this season was a bit difficult for Travis Kelce as he got brutally trolled for his performance on the field, while Taylor Swift also looked upset as she cheered him on.Travis Kelce is also speculated to opt for retirement at the end of this season but nothing has been confirmed yet as he is all set to take a decision in March after his contract ends with the team, the Kansas City Chiefs.Also Read: Taylor Swift reportedly focused on "protecting" her relationship with Travis Kelce as she stepped back from spotlight during the season
Article Summary: Taylor swift is reportedly scared of travis kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding. Kelce had confessed on his popular podcast, new heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college. Taylor swift's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative.

Article Title: Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025: Inside their boxing earnings, Olympic career, love story, and business deals

Jake Paul boxing earnings and business investments

Jutta Leerdam Olympic career and sponsorship income

Jutta Leerdam's net worth is estimated at about $5 million gained from skating profits, prize money, and sponsorships.Jake Paul began boxing full-time in 2018. Since then, he has become one of the highest-earning names in crossover boxing.Jake Paul's fight with Mike Tyson in 2024 and his rematch with Anthony Joshua in 2025 earned millions in pay-per-view subscriptions and ticket sales. The fight against Mike Tyson sold out all of the seats in both Las Vegas and New York City, which produced a huge increase in revenues through the sales of pay-per-view and event tickets.In addition to being an accomplished fighter, Jake Paul runs Most Valuable Promotions, a boxing promotion company, and has also invested in several different gaming and sports investments.Jake Paul earns money from sponsorships, media endeavors, and investment properties. Boxing is only one source of income for Jake Paul.Jutta Leerdam is one of the top speed skaters in the world. She won Olympic silver at the 2022 Winter Olympics in skating sport and has multiple world titles in sprint events.Her income comes from race winnings, ice skating contracts, and brand deals. She has worked with major fashion and tech brands, along with social media partnerships. These deals make up a large part of her yearly earnings.Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam made their relationship public in April 2023. Since then, they have been seen supporting each other at fights and skating events and have been by each other's side.Jake Paul had a noteworthy boxing match in 2025 with boxer Anthony Joshua, but her fiance Jutta Leerdam is still preparing for international ice skating events leading up to the following Olympic cycle.Early 2025 finds both of them prioritizing their careers. They often attend various major public events together as a couple.Also Read: Anthony Joshua Net Worth In 2025: Inside His Boxing Earnings, Career, And Payday Before Jake Paul Fight

Article Title: Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan combined net worth: Breakdown of MLB earning, contracts, endorsements, and other assets
Article Text:
Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan (Image Source: Getty)

Andrew McCutchen’s financial details: Contracts and endorsements

Andrew McCutchen, Maria Hanslovan at 2013 American Music ...

Maria Hanslovan’s fitness career, joint assets, and net worth of the duo





The brilliant career in Major League Baseball was the main factor that created the foundation of Andrew McCutchen’s finances. In 2005, the Pittsburgh Pirates called him up without delay, he threw at the peak of his superstar career, and later, he was awarded five All-Star titles and the National League MVP in 2013. Maria Hanslovan, McCutchen's wife, has set up her own fitness and wellness career which has been a steady income source for the couple and thus, has improved their financial stability.Through 16 seasons in the majors, McCutchen's total money earned from the MLB contracts was about $131.4 million. The highest salary he got was in 2012 when he agreed to a six-year deal, $51.5 million contract extension with the Pirates, thus making the player the franchise’s mainstay.Later transfers to teams like San Francisco Giants, Philadelphia Phillies, and Milwaukee Brewers accounted for even more millions, while his signing of a one-year $5 million contract renewal with the Pirates in 2025 is a testament to both his status as a veteran and his continuing worth to the team. Salaries, however, were not the only way, as he was also coming into the picture through endorsement deals by the likes of Nike and Marucci Sports, whose reputation he was in part making as a respected leader and role model.His public persona of being involved in philanthropy and community outreach, among other things, has made him more marketable and has thus provided him with the needed steady income streams even if he stops playing already.Formal fitness certifications play a minor role in Maria's career; the major part is the inspiration drawn from her personal story. Maria has made herself a confidante in the health and wellness area by sharing her training, eating habits, and playful family life. Her power is not restricted to the fitness world. She represents a person who supports McCutchen's cause and, at the same time, flourishes on her own.Collectively, the MLB power couple, Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan have $60-$65 million. Their wealth keeps rising from professional careers and joint assets alongside brand deals. The couple's net worth is expected to grow in the coming years.Also Read: Will Andrew McCutchen play against Washington Nationals tonight? Latest update on Pittsburgh Pirates star's injury report (April 14, 2025)
Article Summary: Andrew mccutchen and maria hanslovan have a net worth of $60-$65 million. Their wealth keeps rising from professional careers and joint assets alongside brand deals. The couple's net worth is expected to grow in the coming years.

Article Title: Is Anthony Edwards playing tonight vs the Miami Heat? Latest update on the Minnesota Timberwolves star's injury report (January 6, 2026)
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards (Image via Getty)

Anthony Edwards’ availability is the main question surrounding the Minnesota Timberwolves

Anthony Edwards’ current injury situation vs Miami Heat (January 6, 2026)

Edwards’ recent form before the injury listing

Miami Heat injury update

How Anthony Edwards’ status affects the game





ahead of their January 6, 2026 home game against the Miami Heat at Target Center. He was added to the injury report late in the day and is listed as questionable due to right foot injury maintenance.The timing matters. Minnesota is coming off a win over Miami in this short two-game set, and Edwards has been central to that success. His late appearance on the report has shifted attention away from the matchup itself and toward whether the Wolves will have their leading scorer on the floor at tip-off.Anthony Edwards is dealing with right foot maintenance, the same issue that caused him to miss multiple games in December. This is not a new injury, but it is something the team has monitored closely throughout the season. The questionable tag was added only hours before the scheduled 7:00 PM ET start.Minnesota has not indicated that Edwards suffered any setback in his last outing. The listing appears precautionary, especially given his recent workload and the tight schedule. As of now, no final decision has been announced, and his status could change shortly before game time.Before landing on the injury report, Edwards was playing at a high level. He scored 33 points in Minnesota’s 125–115 win over Miami and followed that with a 35-point performance against Washington, along with four steals. He is averaging 28.7 points per game this season, placing him among the league’s top scorers.If Anthony Edwards is unavailable, Minnesota will need to adjust quickly. Guards like Bones Hyland and Mike Conley would take on more responsibility, while the offense would rely more on half-court execution rather than Edwards’ shot creation.Miami enters the game in relatively better shape. Tyler Herro is available after dealing with toe issues and will play alongside Bam Adebayo. Jaime Jaquez Jr. remains out with an ankle sprain. Nikola Jovic and Keshad Johnson are available, while Terry Rozier continues to be sidelined and is not with the team.Minnesota is favored at home, but that edge narrows if Edwards does not play. Without him, the Wolves lean more heavily on Julius Randle and Rudy Gobert for scoring and stability. If Edwards is cleared, Minnesota’s offense looks much closer to what it showed in the previous win. Either way, his status will shape how this rematch unfolds.
Article Summary: Anthony edwards was added to the minnesota timberwolves’ injury report late in the day. He is listed as questionable due to right foot injury maintenance. Minnesota is coming off a win over miami in this short two-game set. If edwards is unavailable, minnesota will need to adjust quickly.

Article Title: Could Jordan Chiles have dominated 2026 NCAA Gymnastics opener for UCLA so easily if her rivals were still competing?
Article Text:
Jordan Chiles (via Getty Images)

Jordan Chiles’ former rivals take up new roles







Jordan Chiles began the 2026 NCAA gymnastics season with a statement performance. She won the all-around with a huge 39.725 score. She also topped all four events. UCLA won the meet with 196.975, finishing ahead of California, Washington, and Oregon State. It was the kind of opening night every athlete hopes for. Chiles looked confident after finishing runner-up in 2025.But the story was not only about who was on the floor. Just a few steps away, familiar faces watched from the sidelines. Jade Carey, Haleigh Bryant, and Mya Lauzon were no longer competing. They were coaching. These were the same gymnasts who pushed Chiles throughout the 2025 season. Their presence raised a big question. If they were still competing, would Chiles have dominated the opener so easily?Jade Carey has already embraced her new chapter. After ending her career at Oregon State, she stayed with the program as a Student Assistant Coach. Gymnastics Now shared a moment of her watching closely, with the caption, “Same team, different role for Coach Carey.” Carey knows what it takes to beat the best. In the 2025 NCAA Championships semifinal, she scored 39.6250 in the all-around. Chiles scored 39.5875 in the same session. Carey finished just ahead of her.Haleigh Bryant followed a similar path. One of LSU’s most successful gymnasts, she retired in April 2025.She soon joined LSU’s coaching staff for the 2025–26 season. After watching the season opener, she posted, “Nights like these are why it was so easy to stay.” Bryant had posted a 39.5625 all-around score in the 2025 semifinals. That was very close to Chiles’ numbers.Mya Lauzon also moved into coaching. After a strong career at Cal, she returned in 2026 as an assistant coach. She shared the opener scores on Instagram and wrote, “Just the beginning for these bears.” Lauzon had tied for the all-around title at the 2025 ACC Championships with 39.625.Jordan Chiles still proved her class. She once posted a season-high 39.775 at the 2025 team final. But if her former rivals were still competing, winning would not have been this easy for her. The competition may be off the floor now, but the pressure remains.Also Read: Jordan Chiles' net worth in 2025: Olympics gymnast's earnings, endorsements, Dancing with the Stars salary and more
Article Summary: Jordan chiles won the 2026 ncaa gymnastics season opener with a huge 39.725 score. Jade carey, haleigh bryant, and mya lauzon were no longer competing but were coaching. Their presence raised a big question: if they were still competing, would chiles have dominated so easily?

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into a million-dollar lifestyle

Erica May-Scherzer’s impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‘Mad Max’, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of the year 2025, Max Scherzer and the love of his life, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets, which are some of the most popular teams of the era.The right-handed player who is currently a free agent, mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings.In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season. Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of Major League Baseball.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated and worked with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max’s wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan’s combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: Max scherzer and erica may-scherzer hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. The couple is one of the most financially secure couples in major league baseball. Scherzer has an eight-time mlc all-star title and three cy young awards.

Article Title: Ravens fans slam Tyler Loop’s fiancée after painful playoff loss vs. Steelers
Article Text:
Image via Getty

One kick that changed everything

Also Read:





The Baltimore Ravens’ heartbreaking loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers has triggered a brutal wave of online abuse, with frustrated fans targeting not just the player involved but also his fiancée. After a missed field goal ended Baltimore’s season, Ravens kicker Tyler Loop and his partner Julia Otto became the focus of angry and abusive messages on social media.The Ravens faced the Pittsburgh Steelers in a high-pressure AFC North clash on January 4. With just two seconds left on the clock, Loop lined up for a 44-yard field goal that could have sealed the division title and extended Baltimore’s playoff run.The kick sailed wide right. The Steelers celebrated, while the Ravens’ season ended in painful fashion.Soon after the final whistle, anger spilled onto Instagram. Fans flooded Loop’s comment sections with harsh criticism, but the abuse did not stop there. Several messages were directed at his fiancée, Julia Otto, including personal and deeply offensive remarks about their relationship and upcoming wedding.Some messages reportedly told her to “cancel the wedding” or made cruel comments about their future together.Otto’s Instagram account was later set to private, while Loop limited comments on several of his posts.The incident once again highlighted the dark side of fan behaviour, where disappointment over a sporting result turns into personal harassment.While many comments were abusive, not all fans joined in the attacks. Some supporters stepped in to defend the rookie kicker, reminding others that football games are rarely decided by one play.“I am a forever Steeler fan and my heart hurts for him. He's just a kid people, give him a break!” one fan wrote. Another added, “Sports betting has poisoned people’s brains”Loop, who was drafted as a late-round pick, had otherwise put together a solid rookie season, making the majority of his field goals and extra points before the miss against Pittsburgh.Broadcast footage from the game showed an emotional Loop walking off the field, visibly shaken. Ravens head coach John Harbaugh was seen consoling the kicker as they headed to the locker room.Speaking after the game, Loop admitted the miss hurt deeply. “For it to end like that sucks,” he said, explaining that he felt something was off the moment the ball left his foot.The Ravens’ loss was painful, but the backlash that followed has raised serious questions about fan conduct. While criticism comes with professional sports, targeting players’ families crosses a line.As Baltimore reflects on a season that ended one kick short, the episode serves as a reminder that behind every missed moment is a human being and that abuse should never be part of the game.
Article Summary: The baltimore ravens lost to the pittsburgh steelers on january 4. Rookie kicker tyler loop missed a 44-yard field goal with two seconds left. Angry fans flooded loop’s comment sections with harsh criticism. Several messages were directed at his fiancée, julia otto.

Article Title: ‘Helmet hit’ on Shedeur Sanders has NFL reviewing Bengals DE Cedric Johnson for possible fine
Article Text:
The NFL is reviewing a helmet hit on Shedeur Sanders that already drew a flag. Now, a fine could be next. (Image via Getty)

NFL reviewing Cedric Johnson hit that drew roughing-the-passer flag

Roughing-the-passer fines can get expensive fast

Shedeur Sanders also walked into a new reality after Kevin Stefanski got fired

Sanders’ offseason plan starts with family, but the QB1 question is still hanging





Shedeur Sanders ended his rookie season with a win. Now the NFL has to decide if the hit he took in that game deserves a financial penalty.The Cleveland Browns beat the Cincinnati Bengals 20-18 on Sunday in their 2025 finale, and Sanders took a controversial shot in the second quarter that already drew a flag. The league is now reviewing it, per Athlon Sports.Sanders helped Cleveland close 2025 with a second straight win, finishing 11 of 22 for 111 yards and adding three carries for 26 yards, according to Athlon Sports. The rookie finished his first season at 120 of 212 passing (56.6%) for 1,400 yards, seven touchdowns, and 10 interceptions.The moment getting reviewed happened in the first half against Cincinnati. Bengals defensive end Cedric Johnson hit Sanders and made contact with his helmet on a late tackle, per the Athlon Sports report. Officials threw a flag for roughing the passer, giving the Browns 15 yards and an automatic first down.Athlon Sports cited Rule 12 Section 12 Article 11 of the NFL rulebook: “any physical acts against a player who is in a passing posture (i.e. before, during, or after attempting a pass) which, in the game official’s judgment, are unwarranted by the circumstances of the play will be called as fouls.”Now the question is whether the league thinks the flag was enough, or if it wants to send a second message with a fine.Athlon Sports noted that roughing the passer carries a potential fine of $17,389 for a first offense and $23,186 for a second.Johnson is in his second NFL season and has not been fined before, per Athlon Sports. If the NFL does issue discipline, Athlon Sports reported it would be announced via the gameday accountability report that publishes every Saturday.That part matters. The on-field call already hit Cincinnati for 15 yards. A fine would hit Johnson’s wallet and put his name on the league’s paperwork, which is the kind of thing defenders do not forget when the NFL starts building a “repeat offender” history.The hit is not the only storyline orbiting Sanders right now. The Browns fired head coach Kevin Stefanski after a 5-12 season and six years in charge, according to TotalProSports.TotalProSports reported Sanders was asked about the move moments after the decision became public. He kept it measured and did not take a victory lap.“We just found out a couple of seconds ago,” Sanders said. “I think it’s overall the mentality, like, things are going to happen. It’s how the league is. Moving forward, just focus on what we can improve individually for the next head coach.”TotalProSports also reported Sanders said after Sunday’s finale that he and Stefanski “grew to understand each other.” Sanders added: “We would share different things that we would both go through,” and, “I know he wanted this win, and I know he wants every win, but I know that this one means a lot.”That is the tightrope for a rookie quarterback. Be honest. Do not burn bridges. Keep it moving because the next coach decides your future.While the NFL sorts out the Bengals hit and Cleveland sorts out its coaching search, Sanders already has his first offseason stop picked out.In a separate report, Rex Villas wrote that Sanders told reporters, via Ashly Holder of Cleveland 19 News: “First and foremost, I have to go see Shilo! I heard he has some Christmas gifts for me. Then be with the family, then get back to work.”Villas also noted Sanders’ short-term future is not locked in. Deshaun Watson and Dillon Gabriel remain on the roster, and Sanders’ case for QB1 will likely get judged again during the next training camp.That is the theme of Sanders’ January. He finished his rookie year with real game reps and a third career win. Now he waits on three separate decisions he cannot control: what the NFL does with that hit, who Cleveland hires next, and how the quarterback depth chart shakes out by the time camp opens.
Article Summary: The nfl is reviewing a helmet hit on shedeur sanders that already drew a flag. Roughing the passer carries a potential fine of $17,389 for a first offense and $23,186 for a second. The browns fired head coach kevin stefanski after a 5-12 season and six years.

Article Title: “I wanted to punch her face”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry opens up about the anger and pain she feels when women approach the NBA legend
Article Text:
Stephen Curry's wife, Ayesha Curry, opens up about women flirting with the NBA legend.(Image via Taylor Hill/Getty Images)

Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, reveals what she feels when women try to pursue the NBA legend



Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, has gotten brutally trolled







Stephen Curry and his wife, Ayesha Curry, have inspired their fans around the world with the commitment they have shown towards each other for more than a decade.Stephen Curry, the Golden State Warriors’ star player, has always been known to be a perfect husband and a loving father who has always prioritised his family. Despite this, Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, opens up about the rage she feels when other women try to pursue her husband.A few years ago, Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, spoke to Jada Pinkett Smith on the now discontinued show, Red Table Talk, where she opened up about her anger.Ayesha Curry said, "But there have been a couple of times, where I've wanted to punch somebody in the face for sure…He can't see it coming, I see it from a mile away."The popular entrepreneur added, "Stephen is very nice by nature…Everything is always very friendly, sometimes to the point where, 'I'm a grown woman,' so, I'll just insert myself and be like, 'Hello, how are you doing?'"Ayesha Curry added that "the ladies will always be lurking, hoping for their moment and waiting. I honestly hate it…" she added.However, the NBA legend Stephen Curry has stayed away from commenting on such matters as he focuses on supporting his wife and children through all the challenges they face.These comments of Ayesha Curry’s have resurfaced at a time when a few months ago, she sparked outrage when she opened up about how she did not want to get married or have children.Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, appeared on the Call Her Daddy podcast, where she said, “No. I didn’t want kids. I didn’t want to get married. I thought I was going to be a ‘career girl,’ and that’s it.”The popular mom of four continued, “After we got married, we found out we were pregnant with our daughters so quickly, I didn’t even have time to think about what I wanted anymore…”But things changed when she met Stephen Curry and the two quickly fell in love and ended up tying the knot in 2011.Also Read: Fact check: Did Klay Thompson spend New Year’s Eve with rumored ex girlfriend Imaan Hammam instead of Megan Thee Stallion?
Article Summary: Stephen curry's wife, ayesha curry, opens up about women flirting with the nba legend. The popular entrepreneur added that "the ladies will always be lurking, hoping for their moment and waiting. I honestly hate it" a few months ago, she sparked outrage when she said she did not want to get married or have children.

Article Title: Detroit Red Wings score three goals in first period with major win against Ottawa Senators
Article Text:
Patrick Kane with the Detroit red Wings (Via Getty Images)

Detroit Red Wings climb back on top of Atlantic Division after recent win

Red Wings vs. Senators | NHL Highlights | January 05, 2026

Also Read:





The Detroit Red Wings made their coach's line changes look brilliant. Todd McLellan shuffled his forward lines before Monday night's game against Ottawa, and his team responded with three first-period goals in a 5-3 victory that pushed them back into first place in the Eastern Conference.James van Riemsdyk recorded a goal and two assists for his second multi-point game of the season, while John Gibson turned aside 35 shots to backstop the victory. The Red Wings improved to 25-15-4 with 54 points, reaching the 25-win mark in just 44 games for the fastest pace since the 2011-12 season.Van Riemsdyk explained that McLellan's decision to shuffle the lines sent a clear message to the group. "Anytime the coach kind of shuffles up the lines a good amount like that, he's probably just trying to get the team's attention," he said.He continued, "We had guys contributing all over the place tonight, and that's what it takes to win." The Red Wings came out flying in the opening period, scoring three times in the first 19:43 to put Ottawa in a deep hole. Andrew Copp opened the scoring at 7:06 with a breakaway goal after stealing the puck in the neutral zone.Dylan Larkin added a power-play goal at 13:51 for his 22nd of the season, tying Nicklas Lidstrom for 11th place on the franchise's all-time goals list with 264.Van Riemsdyk capped the first-period surge with a goal at 19:43, spinning around in the right face-off circle and snapping a shot that deflected off Nick Jensen past Leevi Merilainen.The Ottawa goaltender was pulled after allowing three goals on eight shots, with Hunter Shepard entering in relief. Gibson was especially good in the opening stretch with 17 saves within the period to keep Detroit’s three-goal lead intact.Michael Rasmussen praised his goaltender's performance after the game. "He's been awesome for us," Rasmussen said. "MVP for us tonight." Ottawa made things interesting in the second and third periods. But the Senators didn’t take the loss lying down.The duo of Claude Giroux and Dylan Cozens quickly scored to cut the deficit to 3-2 before Lucas Raymond restored the two-goal lead with his 12th of the season at 15:42 of the second period. Brady Tkachuk, meanwhile, quickly scored in the third period to make the scoreline 4-3 early on.But Rasmussen scored a crucial short-handed goal at 12:53 to give the Red Wings breathing room. The penalty kill finished 5-for-6 on the night, continuing their strong recent play. The victory demonstrated the Red Wings responding exactly as McLellan had hoped when he made his line changes, with contributions coming from throughout the lineup in a complete team effort.
Article Summary: Detroit red wings beat ottawa senators 5-3 in monday night's game. James van riemsdyk recorded a goal and two assists for his second multi-point game of the season. The red wings improved to 25-15-4 with 54 points, reaching the 25-win mark in just 44 games.

Article Title: “I didn’t expect it”: Brady Tkachuk finally reacts to Logan Stanley’s controversial punch in Senators game against Jets
Article Text:
Brady Tkachuk talks about Logan Stanley’s punch (Image via: Getty Images)

Brady Tkachuk stays calm while talking about the punch from Logan Stanley







Ottawa Senators captain Brady Tkachuk faced a tense moment on the ice earlier this month during a game against the Winnipeg Jets. The incident happened midway through the second period of Ottawa’s 4-2 win on January 3, highlighting the physical nature of the game and the challenges players face in high-pressure NHL games.The altercations involved a punch thrown by the Jets’ defenseman, Logan Stanley, who punched Tkachuk when he was still involved in the action on the ice. Referees stepped in immediately and gave Tkachuk a misconduct penalty with an assessment of ten minutes, and later suspended the player. The event sparked discussions around discipline, player safety, and the limits of aggressive play in the league.Tkachuk described the moment as completely unexpected. “Honestly, I was still watching the play, and then out of the corner of my eye I just see the punch coming. Caught me by surprise. I didn't expect it,” he said. Despite the incident, he quickly moved past it, returning to the game and recording an assist to help Ottawa secure the win.Video review confirmed Tkachuk was not facing Stanley when the punch landed, a key factor in the league’s decision. He added, “The league made its decision. I'm over it, I could care less now, it's in the past.” He stayed focused on helping his team, showing why he’s considered a strong leader on and off the ice.The incident didn’t distract him from Ottawa’s game plan.Stanley, who has relied heavily on physical play this season, has already recorded 82 penalty minutes through 40 games, surpassing his career high. His suspension sidelines him for the Jets’ home game against the Vegas Golden Knights, though he is expected back against the Edmonton Oilers later this week. Ottawa’s win extended Winnipeg’s losing streak to nine games, underscoring both the Senators’ momentum and Tkachuk’s leadership on the ice.The incident highlights the NHL's focus on player safety while being able to show the fine line between aggressive play and disciplinary action. Tkachuk's calm and measured response shows professionalism under pressure, while Stanley's approach does represent the fragility associated with physical enforcement in high-intensity games.Also Read: Jets defenseman Logan Stanley receives one-game suspension for incident involving Ottawa Senators captain Brady Tkachuk
Article Summary: Brady tkachuk was punched in the face by winnipeg jets defenseman logan stanley. The incident happened during ottawa's 4-2 win over the jets on january 3. Stanley was given a one-game suspension for the punch, which was upheld after a video review.

Article Title: From Lamar Odom to Jaylen Brown: Inside the never-ending Kardashian-Jenner NBA dating saga
Article Text:
Kendall Jenner and Ben Simmons. Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson (Image via getty)

Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian

Rashad McCants and Khloe Kardashian



Kris Humphries and Kim Kardashian

James Harden and Khloe Kardashian

Tristan Thompson and Khloe Kardashian

Blake Griffin and Kendall Jenner

(L) Kendall Jenner with Devin Booker, (R) Kendall with Blake Griffin (Image via Getty)

Ben Simmons and Kendall Jenner

Devin Booker and Kendall Jenner

Jaylen Brown and Kendall Jenner are reportedly dating (Image via Getty Images)

Jaylen Brown and Kendall Jenner





The intersection of professional basketball and the Kardashian-Jenner empire has become one of the most persistent storylines in modern sports media. For over a decade, courtside seats at NBA arenas have served as the backdrop for high-profile romances that often dominate headlines as much as the games themselves. This combination of hardwood players with the glitz of show business has been a cultural crossover, with critics often debating the impact of these pairings. But the tabloid has a field day with this fodder.The list of the NBA superstars who have headlined entertainment sites due to their relationship with the cast of Keeping Up With the Kardashians could create another superstar roster by itself. Let’s dive in and see how these couples navigated the pressure of the court and the spotlight of reality television.The most significant early chapter of this trend began with the Los Angeles Lakers star. His 2009 whirlwind marriage to Khloé Kardashian was a cornerstone of the family’s media rise, even spawning a spin-off series. Despite his success as a two-time NBA champion, his personal struggles eventually led to a high-profile split, though the two remained legally entangled for years.Khloe and McCants' relationship could be seen as the first on the list after they briefly dated from late 2008 to early 2009.The pair later appeared on KUWTK in late 2009, while Khloe was married to Lamar Odom, where Khloe claimed McCants had cheated on her. But McCants later stated that the entire thing was nothing but a fabricated storyline to keep the show interesting. This highly publicised relationship, as claimed by McCants, “negatively affected” his career and cost him some big bucks.Perhaps the most scrutinized marriage in the family’s history occurred in 2011 when Kim Kardashian married the New Jersey Nets’ forward. The union famously lasted only 72 days before a divorce filing sparked months of tabloid speculation. Though the relationship was brief, it cemented the connection between the league and the Calabasas-based family.During a period of transition, Khloe Kardashian was linked to the prolific scoring guard. Their relationship in 2015 brought a new level of media attention to the Houston Rockets star, who later admitted that the intensity of the public spotlight was a challenge to manage alongside his professional commitments.No relationship on this list has seen more public ups and downs than the one between Khloé and the Cleveland Cavaliers center. Spanning several years and involving the birth of two children, their timeline has been defined by multiple reconciliations and very public controversies, keeping them at the center of the news cycle long after Thompson’s championship run.The family’s interest in the league shifted toward the younger generation when Kendall Jenner began dating the high-flying forward in 2017. The romance rumours sparked shortly after Griffin's split from his ex-fiance, Brynn Cameron. The relationship between Griffin and Kendall only lasted till early 2018, after reported suggested the couple has "cooled off." During his transition from the Clippers to the Pistons, the two were a frequent sight at concerts and dinners, representing a shift toward a more private, yet still highly visible, dating style.Continuing the trend of elite guards and forwards, Kendall was later linked to the Philadelphia 76ers standout. Their on-again, off-again relationship was a staple of 2018 and 2019, often highlighted by Kendall’s appearances at the Wells Fargo Center.The most enduring of the recent pairings involved the Phoenix Suns star. Devin Booker and Kendall were an item for over two years, frequently appearing on each other’s social media and attending high-profile events like the U.S. Open. Even after a reported split in late 2022, the couple was spotted together in late 2024 and early 2025, fueling the rumors, and it persisted well into 2025 as they seemed to communicate actively.The most recent addition to the rumor mill of NBA players and Kardashian-Jenner involves the Boston Celtics star, Jaylen Brown. Just barely six days into 2026, reports began to circulate linking him and Kendall Jenner, suggesting that despite her brief pivots toward the music industry, the connection between the supermodel and the NBA’s elite remains as strong as ever.Also read: The 5 highest-paid coaches in NBA right now: Steve Kerr, Mike Brown, and more
Article Summary: The intersection of professional basketball and the kardashian-jenner empire has become one of the most persistent storylines in modern sports media. For over a decade, courtside seats at nba arenas have served as the backdrop for high-profile romances that often dominate headlines.

Article Title: Katie Moon's net worth: A closer look American pole vaulter's Olympic success, prize money, and endorsements
Article Text:
Katie Moon (Image Source: Getty)

A glimpse of pole vault champion Katie Moon’s career earnings

Inside the potential financial earnings and growth of Katie Moon





One of her kind, Katie Moon is an inspiration for this generation, as she is one of the gold medallists from America who has been awarded several titles and prizes for her excellent pole vault performance on the world stage. Katie Moon, a professional pole vaulter, was born in the year 1991. Katie Moon has participated in several Olympics and has been awarded significant medals, including gold medals and silver medals at the Olympic level.She was a participant in the Summer Olympics of the year 2020, followed by the World Athletics Championships, which were held in the years 2022 and 2023. Other than that, she has also been a participant in the Indoor Championships, which were held in the year 2022, followed by another Summer Olympics, which were held in 2024. In all these events, she has gained fame for winning gold medals as well as silver medals.In the year 2019, Katie Moon was awarded a silver medal for her performance in the Pan-American Games. Katie Moon is a popular athletic figure in America as well as a globally recognised athlete because she was the first woman in America to win the pole vault three times in a row at the World Athletics Championship.At the age of 9, Katie Moon was recognised as a level four gymnast, and by the time of her graduation, she had marked her state record with 3.97 m in the pole vault.Although there has been no exact figure for her annual net income, it is believed that her primary source of income is from earnings from participation in different Olympics as well as championships. At present, it can be calculated to be approximately around $2 million, which is the net worth of Katie Moon, which is a combination of her prize medals, her sponsorships, her event money, etc.She was also a part of the Tokyo Olympic Games in the year 2020, where she won gold medals by representing America in the Olympics. Apart from that, her biggest contribution to her net worth is a significant payment by the government sponsorship for winning gold medals as well as silver medals.She has also received relevant prize money from the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Committee. Apart from that, given her performance and her number of titles and awards, she has also secured a long-term financial sponsorship by the government, which has resulted in securing her financial profile. On the other hand, she has also received bonus prizes and money, which she has earned for her performance.Also Read: Nathan Adrian's Net Worth: How an Olympic sprint legend built success in and out of the pool
Article Summary: Katie moon, a professional pole vaulter, was born in the year 1991. She has participated in several olympics and has been awarded significant medals, including gold medals and silver medals at the olympic level. Katie moon is a popular athletic figure in america as well as a globally recognised athlete because she was the first woman in america to win the pole vault three times in a row.

Article Title: Alex Wennberg's three-year contract extension allows San Jose Sharks to rebuild their core offense
Article Text:
Alex Wennberg with the San Jose Sharks (Via Getty Images)

Alex Wennberg will allow San Jose Sharks to build their forward line around Macklin Celebrini

Also Read:





With the re-signing of Alex Wennberg, the San Jose Sharks are looking poised to finally build a playoff-caliber team. The Swedish center’s three-year contract extension will allow the management to experiment with what works for them while continuing to have some much-needed veteran presence.Wennberg’s $6 million AAV shows that the Sharks have faith in him. With rookie sensation Macklin Celebrini already breaking records, the team understands that they need playoff experience and consistent production to help a young roster learning how to compete.Wennberg has already established himself as a regular on playoff contenders. He spent six seasons with Columbus, posting at least 30 points three times while contributing to multiple postseason appearances. His time with the expansion Seattle Kraken proved equally productive.He has already helped the franchise reach the second round of the Western Conference playoffs during his second season with the team. The veteran center's playoff pedigree extends to last season, when he joined the New York Rangers.Wennberg helped them secure the President's Trophy and played all 16 postseason games during their run to the Eastern Conference Final.That experience is invaluable for a Sharks team that hasn't tasted playoff hockey in years.So far, Wennberg has met the expectations with which the Sharks welcomed him to their club, with him earning 35 points across 77 regular-season games last season. This season he is continuing to boost the Sharks' points production with 26 points in 41 games, putting him on pace for one of his greatest NHL campaigns.The timing of Wennberg's extension aligns perfectly with the Sharks' rebuild timeline. Logan Couture's contract comes off the books after the 2026-27 season, and other senior deals like those of Jeff Skinner and Ryan Reaves expire this year.That creates financial flexibility for San Jose to make additional roster moves and re-signings over the next few seasons. With Celebrini enjoying a phenomenal sophomore season and the Sharks pushing back into playoff contention, locking up Wennberg provides stability at center ice.The veteran's consistent production and playoff experience will be vital as San Jose's young core matures and learns what it takes to win in high-pressure situations. The extension signals that the Sharks believe their rebuild is progressing ahead of schedule. Wennberg won't just be part of the rebuild anymore. He'll be part of the contending team that emerges on the other side.
Article Summary: Alex wennberg has signed a three-year contract extension with the san jose sharks. The veteran center's $6 million aav shows that the sharks have faith in him. He has already helped the franchise reach the second round of the western conference playoffs during his second season.

Article Title: Chiefs quietly prepare for life after Travis Kelce as draft buzz grows around a new tight end option
Article Text:
Travis Kelce (via Getty Images)

Why Kenyon Sadiq fits Kansas City’s long-term offensive reset





The Kansas City Chiefs are entering one of the most uncertain offseasons the franchise has faced in years. A 6–11 finish in 2025 not only ended their long playoff streak but also raised uncertainties about the future of the roster’s core leaders. Travis Kelce , who is undoubtedly the face of the offense for over a decade, is nearing the end of his contract and openly weighing what comes next.With Patrick Mahomes rehabbing a major knee injury and possible coaching changes looming, Kansas City is being forced to plan and enforce necessary changes. That planning now appears to include a potential successor at tight end, a position that has defined the Chiefs’ identity during their championship run.Kelce’s impact cannot be overstated, as was seen in this season, despite being a lackluster one. He also etched his name deeper into NFL history by becoming the fastest tight end to reach 13,000 career receiving yards. Still, the retirement speculation has only grown louder, especially with his high-profile relationship and upcoming marriage with Taylor Swift keeping him constantly in the spotlight.Draft experts believe Kansas City must act decisively for their future.Todd McShay of The Ringer recently connected the Chiefs to Oregon tight end Kenyon Sadiq in his early 2026 mock draft. McShay declared "A lot of retirement news, potentially, about Travis Kelce. Regardless, Kenyon Sadiq, tight end, Oregon. This is going to be a retooled Chiefs next year. Mahomes, get him a difference maker."Sadiq’s profile makes McShay’s idea compelling. He was a central piece of Oregon’s offense, earning Big Ten Tight End of the Year honors while leading all FBS tight ends in receiving touchdowns. His chemistry with quarterback Dante Moore showcased his ability to thrive against top defenses in competitive, high-intensity games.McShay believes that Sadiq could be the perfect replacement for Kelce and continue being the perfect safety valve for Mahomes. He placed Sadiq in the #9 spot in his 2026 mock draft. Whether Kelce returns or walks away, Kansas City appears determined to stay ahead of the curve, and adding Sadiq would be an intriguing decision.Also read: Travis Kelce reflects on a tough season as retirement questions linger
Article Summary: The kansas city chiefs are entering one of the most uncertain offseasons the franchise has faced in years. Travis kelce is nearing the end of his contract and openly weighing what comes next. Todd mcshay of the ringer recently connected the chiefs to oregon tight end kenyon sadiq in his early 2026 mock draft.

Article Title: Igor Shesterkin's injury raises concern for New York Rangers' season after Utah Mammoth game
Article Text:
Igor Shesterkin (Image Source: Getty)

Igor Shesterkin injury update from the New York Rangers and Utah Mammoth game







National Hockey League life is usually linked with full stadiums, tight training regimes, and unremitting attention to the results of games, NHL match results, and injuries. Nevertheless, a fan's attention can be attained at times just as rapidly by moments near the ice as it is by a highlight-reel goal or a news roundup about the NHL.This happened to Pittsburgh Penguins forward Rickard Rakell when post-game fatigue unexpectedly became a viral discussion topic. Rather than being inundated with the preview of an NHL match or the rankings of the team, fans were laughing at a relatable view of the daily routine of a professional hockey player.The moment was initiated following a recent Pittsburgh Penguins match, where Rickard Rakell was obviously exhausted as he was on media availability after the game. As the forward discussed the game and the work of the team, his worn-out face soon became the subject of a social media joke made by his wife, Emmeli Rakell. In a sarcastic caption, she had indicated that, though the NHL life was grinding, Rakell still had to go home and do his household duties.The joke resonated with fans on all social platforms, and was rapidly going beyond the confines of the Penguins circles and into the larger NHL updates discussion.Emmeli Rakell would later go on to follow up on the joke by posting a follow-up post of Rickard Rakell washing clothes, and that she was not only teasing around.Instead of getting offended, Rakell seemed to be enjoying the joke and laughing at the attention as well as demonstrating that he feels comfortable with the viral moment. The viral exchange was a welcome change of pace to the routine headlines as the Pittsburgh Penguins proceed to schedule and prepare for the next NHL game today.Also Read: Brad Marchand’s lifestyle: Inside Florida Panthers star’s early life, NHL career, and personal adventures
Article Summary: Pittsburgh penguins forward rickard rakell was on media availability after a game. His worn-out face soon became the subject of a social media joke made by his wife. The joke resonated with fans on all social platforms, and was rapidly going beyond the confines of the penguins circles.
